name: Two On The Track
description:
Two On The Track is a game about an old man and a young guy, who are riding a handcar near the ocean, trying to get back home.
They are so different, they don't like each other, but have to move forward together.

This game was developed during TrainJam 2015 – 52 hours game jam in a train from Chicago to San Francisco.

Team behind the game:

Ksenia Shatunova – art & music
Alic Szecsei – coding
Anton Kolchunov – coding
